definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Last week, our class want to spring outing.
sentences.chinese: 上週，我們的課堂要春遊。

sentences.english: In classroom, students are reward or punish by teachers.
sentences.chinese: 課堂賞罰施動者是教師，而受動者是學生。

sentences.english: So in this course, Python the language we're going to use is Python.
sentences.chinese: 所以在這個課堂上，我們要用的語言是。

sentences.english: I watched Cla room on the Air on TV.
sentences.chinese: 我收看電視中的“空中課堂”。
《課堂戰爭》一書充滿了這些內容。

sentences.english: His classes are very interesting, after class he often helps us to study English.
sentences.chinese: 他的課堂很有趣，課後常幫我們學英語。

sentences.english: Students read texts loudly and clearly in class.
sentences.chinese: 課堂上同學們很認真地朗聲讀課文。

sentences.english: The physical layouts of classrooms vary. Initially, student desks stand in rows.
sentences.chinese: 課堂裏的實體佈局變化，首先是，課桌排成行。

sentences.english: This essay is to probe the effective English leading-in to the class.
sentences.chinese: 本文就是筆者對英語課堂導入進行的探討。

sentences.english: Some teachers find it difficult to keep their classes in order.
sentences.chinese: 有些教師感到難以維持課堂秩序。

sentences.english: However, it is still serious that Chinese classroom teaching is inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 然而當前語文課堂教學效率低下現象依然嚴重。

sentences.english: OK? So the example I'm going to do, I'm going to search a sorted list.
sentences.chinese: 來搜索目標元素，好，翻到課堂材料的第二頁。

sentences.english: Teachers use their mode of teaching to teach students.
sentences.chinese: 課堂中，教師用自主閱讀的教學模式上英文報閱讀課。

sentences.english: With the muti-media in the class, it can enhance students' interests.
sentences.chinese: 隨着多媒體出現在課堂上，它能增強學生的興趣。

sentences.english: High school Chinese classroom to raise teaching of reviewing etc. teaching quality of Chinese there is a great meaning.
sentences.chinese: 高中語文課堂反思性教學對提高教學質量有重大意義。

sentences.english: Watch Ricky.He sometimes likes to act up in class.
sentences.chinese: 注意裏基，他有時喜歡在課堂上搗亂。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
